add_custom_command(
	OUTPUT config.h
	COMMAND cp ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/config.h.LINUXAMD64 config.h
)
add_executable(qmake
	ar.c
	arscan.c
	commands.c
	config.h
	default.c
	dir.c
	expand.c
	file.c
	function.c
	getopt.c
	getopt1.c
	hash.c
	implicit.c
	job.c
	main.c
	misc.c
	read.c
	remake.c
	remote-sge.c
	rule.c
	signame.c
	strcache.c
	variable.c
	version.c
	vpath.c
)
target_compile_definitions(qmake PRIVATE
	LOCALEDIR="/usr/local/share/locale"
	INCLUDEDIR="/usr/local/include"
	LIBDIR="/usr/local/lib"
)
target_compile_options(qmake PRIVATE
	-Wno-strict-prototypes
	-Wno-return-local-addr
)
target_include_directories(qmake PRIVATE
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}
	../../clients/common
	../../common
	../../daemons/qmaster
	../../libs
	../../libs/cull
	../../libs/evm
	../../libs/sgeobj
	../../libs/uti
	../common
)
target_link_libraries(qmake PRIVATE
	comm
	commlists
	cull
	evc
	gdi
	japi
	parse_job_cull
	parse_qsub
	read_defaults
	sge_mt_init
	sge_options
	sgeobj
	sgeobjd
	show_job
	sig_handlers
	usage
	ssl
	uti
)
